title: Premium gold-on-obsidian UI polish for profile landing page

requirements.summary: Refresh visual theme to a more premium, consistent luxury gold-on-obsidian system (typography, spacing, borders, shadows, and interaction states) across the profile landing page.
acceptanceCriteria: All interactive elements (Share button, CTA buttons, link buttons) share a consistent shape, border, shadow, and hover/active behavior.
Typography scale is consistent (display name, bio, button labels, footer) and readable on mobile and desktop.
No new features are introduced; this is a visual/UX polish pass only.

file_operations.description: Refine the global gold/obsidian theme tokens and base typography defaults to support a consistent premium look (e.g., tuned foreground contrast, border/ring/shadow feel, and smoother interactive transitions) without introducing new features.
Add a small, reusable button/link component that standardizes shape, border, shadow, spacing, and hover/press states for all profile actions (used for Share, CTA, and link rows).

Adopt the shared premium UI system by switching Share/CTA/link rows to the new reusable button component and aligning typography/spacing/shadows across header, card, and footer while preserving existing behavior and hard-coded Instagram/Snapchat URLs.

requirements.summary: Simplify layout and improve scroll feel by tightening vertical rhythm and keeping the profile card centered and stable across viewport sizes, avoiding overflow and scroll jitter.
acceptanceCriteria: On small screens, the card fits comfortably with appropriate padding and no horizontal overflow.
On large screens, the profile card remains centered with a sensible max width and consistent whitespace.
Background remains fixed and does not cause visual jitter during scroll.

file_operations.description: Adjust page structure (header/main/footer spacing), card max-width and padding, and background layering to ensure a centered, balanced card layout from mobile to desktop with no horizontal overflow and stable scroll (fixed background without jitter).

Add any minimal global base/utility tweaks needed to prevent horizontal overflow and to keep scroll/viewport behavior stable (e.g., consistent body sizing/overflow handling) while maintaining the existing theme approach.

requirements.summary: Polish CTA/link buttons for consistent sizing and alignment, including perfect Snapchat row alignment and crisp icon rendering.
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons use the same height, padding, border radius, and icon size rules.
Buttons with and without icons align text consistently (no left/right shifting).
Snapchat icon renders crisply at the same visual size as lucide icons and is vertically centered.

file_operations.description: Ensure the shared button component enforces uniform height, padding, border radius, icon slot sizing, and label alignment; include a reserved icon container so rows without icons still align with icon rows.

Render all CTA/link rows through the shared button component, passing lucide icons and the Snapchat image consistently so icon sizing and vertical centering match across all rows (including Snapchat).

requirements.summary: Update the default bio copy and add a safe localStorage migration that only updates bio when it matches the previous default string.
acceptanceCriteria: DEFAULT_PROFILE.bio is updated to a clearer short English bio.
A migration runs on load that updates stored bio only when it exactly matches the old default bio string.
Users who already customized their bio keep their bio unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update DEFAULT_PROFILE.bio to a clearer 1â€“2 line English introduction, retaining all other default fields as-is.

Add a localStorage migration on load that compares loadedProfile.bio against the previous default bio string and updates it to the new DEFAULT_PROFILE.bio only on an exact match; do not overwrite user-customized bios.
